items.name: Meowcha Matcha
items.description: Delicious oat milk matcha over ice, served with vanilla sweet cream cold foam.

items.name: Catnip Cooler
items.description: Refreshing iced tea infused with mint and a hint of lemon.

items.name: Tuxedo Tea Latte
items.description: Start with chai concentrate and milk, froth in heavy cream and sprinkle with cinnamon. Served in a custom tuxedo mug based on Tuxedo man from Sailor Moon.

items.name: Pawfee Delight
items.description: Three shots of espresso with your choice of milk, sweetened with white chocolate syrup and topped with marshmallows.

items.name: Kitty Krispy
items.description: Homemade rice crispy treat with frosted whisker design

items.name: Tabby Cat Scones
items.description: Your choice of scone, including lemon poppy seed, blueberry, and pumpkin.
